title: Jennifer Lopez talks about Versace runway dress on This Morning
text:
She was the talk of Milan Fashion Week when she made a surprise appearance on the Versace runway in the iconic jungle print dress that she first wore 20 years ago.

Appearing on Monday's This Morning, Jennifer Lopez reflected on her headline-grabbing moment last month, admitting she felt the 'electricity' in the room as she surprised the celeb-packed FROW with her runway appearance.

Jennifer, 50, explained that she was in talks with Donatella Versace about how to celebrate the 20 year anniversary of the jungle print dress, that the star first wore to the 2000 Grammy Awards.

Icon: Jennifer Lopez has called her walk down the Milan Fashion Week runway last month in the iconic jungle print dress from Versace 'electrifying'

Talking about how the Milan runway appearance came about, JLo recalled: 'Donatella and I have had a long relationship and bond over the last 20 years.'

'I saw her at the Met Ball and she was like, you know it’s been 20 years since the jungle print dress and she said "I’m thinking of doing a whole collection on it."'

Jennifer insisted all the praise should go to Donatella, gushing: 'There was so much electricity in the room and there was so much love for her. To create something that has that much impact is a pretty special thing and I was happy to be a part of that with her.'

Remember this? Jennifer, 50, explained that she was in talks with Donatella Versace about how to celebrate the 20 year anniversary of the jungle print dress

The mother of two wowed the audience with her incredible physique in the barely-there Versace dress, but the star insists the key to her looks is nothing more than self-care.

'Honestly, I’m just consistent with trying to take care of myself. With working out even when I don’t want to, I do 3 or 4 times a week. I try to have consistency and balance.'

Jennifer, who is engaged to Alex Rodriguez, 'I have kids and a relationship so sometimes I feel overwhelmed with all the different things I’m doing. But I think I’m doing OK.'

Friends: Talking about how the Milan runway appearance came about, JLo recalled: 'Donatella and I have had a long relationship and bond over the last 20 years'

Wow: The mother of two wowed the audience with her incredible physique in the barely-there Versace dress, but the star insists the key to her looks is nothing more than self-care

It's an exciting time for the multi-talented star who has been winning rave reviews for her lead role in new movie Hustlers.

Speaking about the Oscar buzz surrounding her, Jennifer told This Morning:

'I feel excited about that. You work hard your whole life. You try to grow and get better with everything you do. Every role that you do, to be in that conversation is really humbling and exciting.'
description: She was the talk of Milan Fashion Week when she made a surprise appearance on the Versace runway in the iconic jungle dress that she first wore 20 years ago.
